meanings.definition: A French term of address for a young unmarried woman.
meanings.sent1: The kind mademoiselles helped me find my way in Paris.
meanings.sent2: The mademoiselles at the cafe were chatting and laughing.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat followed the mademoiselles around the garden.
meanings.sent4: The field of flowers swayed gently as the mademoiselles danced.
meanings.sent5: The colorful dresses of the mademoiselles brightened up the street.

meanings.sent1: I invited all the mademoiselles to the party.
meanings.sent2: The mademoiselles waved goodbye as the train departed.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the mademoiselles' picnic basket.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled above the mademoiselles gathered in the park.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh pastries filled the room where the mademoiselles sat.
